results.description: Some short men have a hard time meeting women - but not all, it seems.
results.title: Dating as a short man: The highs and lows

results.description: Triple Olympic rowing gold medallist Pete Reed is paralysed from below his chest after suffering a spinal stroke.
results.title: Pete Reed: Triple Olympic rowing gold medallist paralysed after spinal stroke

results.description: Para-rower Benjamin Pritchard has put his career as an insurance broker on hold to become a full time rower.
results.title: Benjamin Pritchard: Para-rower goes full-time for Paralympics

results.description: A French mayor complains a helicopter will be needed to remove the machine.
results.shortTitle: Outcry as marine dumps rowing machine on Mt Blanc
results.title: Mont Blanc: Outcry as ex-marine dumps rowing machine near peak

altText: Matthew Disney scales a mountain with a rowing machine

results.description: Banbridge rower Philip Doyle and partner Ronan Byrne are rewarded for their "bravery" as they win a silver medal for Ireland in the double sculls at the World Championships.
results.title: Doyle and Byrne's 'aggressive plan' yields world silver

thumbnail.altText: Ronan Byrne and Philip Doyle with their silver medals

Ronan Byrne and Philip Doyle with their silver medals

results.description: Great Britain add the men's eight bronze medal to their World Rowing Championships haul on the final day in Austria.
results.shortTitle: GB win men's eight bronze in Austria
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Great Britain's men's eight win bronze in Austria

results.description: Watch Ireland's Sanita Puspure win single sculls gold at the World Rowing Championships with Great Britain's Vicky Thornley in fourth.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Ireland's Puspure wins single sculls gold, with GB's Thornley fourth
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Ireland's Sanita Puspure takes single sculls gold

results.description: Great Britain finish third in Men's eight event to secure qualification for Tokyo 2020 as the Netherlands finishing in second and Germany taking home the gold.
results.shortTitle: Watch: GB secure men's eight bronze to qualify for Tokyo 2020
results.title: World Rowing Championships: GB secure men's eight bronze to qualify for Tokyo 2020

results.description: Banbridge man Philip Doyle and partner Ronan Byrne narrowly miss out on world gold as Rebecca Shorten helps GB secure an Olympic spot.
results.shortTitle: Doyle helps Ireland win world silver
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Ireland duo Doyle and Byrne win silver as Shorten helps GB book Tokyo spot

results.description: Watch as Lauren Rowles and Laurence Whiteley pick up Great Britain's first gold medal of the 2019 World Rowing Championships with a win in the PR mixed double sculls.
results.shortTitle: GB win para mixed double sculls at worlds
results.title: World Rowing Championships: GB win PR mixed double sculls

results.description: Great Britain add two gold and two bronze medals to their tally in Austria on the penultimate day of the World Rowing Championships.
results.shortTitle: Two gold & two bronze for GB in Austria
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Two gold & two bronze medals for Great Britain

results.description: Maddie Arlett claims Great Britain's first medal at the World Rowing Championships by winning bronze in the women's lightweight single scull.
results.shortTitle: Arlett wins GB's first medal at Worlds
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Maddie Arlett claims bronze for Great Britain

results.description: Welshman Ben Pritchard ensures Great Britain will compete in the PR1 men's single sculls at the Tokyo Paralympics.
results.shortTitle: Pritchard earns GB spot at Paralympics
results.title: Ben Pritchard: Welsh single sculler earns GB rowing spot at 2020 Tokyo Paralympics

results.description: Great Britain's women's eight must only avoid a last place finish in Sunday's final at the World Rowing Championships to qualify for Tokyo.
results.shortTitle: Shorten helps GB to cusp of qualification
results.title: World Rowing Championships: Rebecca Shorten helps GB to cusp of Olympic qualification

results.description: Olympic silver medallist Vicky Thornley has reached Friday's semi-finals in the women's single sculls at the World Championships in Linz, Austria.
results.title: Vicky Thornley: Olympic silver medallist reaches World Championships semi-finals
